title: Pork noodles with bean sauce
description: This pork mince stir-fry cooks in minutes and you can use either yellow bean or black bean sauce.
ingredients: 300g/10½oz dried or fresh egg noodles, cooked according to the packet instructions and drained
1 tbsp fresh root ginger, finely chopped
3 tbsp spring onions, chopped, plus extra for garnish
3 tbsp yellow bean sauce or black bean sauce
1½ tbsp Shaoxing rice wine or dry sherry (optional)
½ tsp freshly ground black pepper
